name: @wpm-js/runtime
description: As a base runtime for core's api
author: <jacky112365362@gmail.com>

scripts.build:commonjs: cross-env NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=commonjs babel --root-mode upward src --out-dir lib
scripts.build:es: cross-env NODE_ENV=production babel src --root-mode upward --out-dir es
scripts.build: npm run build:commonjs && npm run build:es
